name: Get Invite
description: Returns an [invite](#DOCS_RESOURCES_INVITE/invite-object) object for the given code.

query.name: with_counts
query.description: whether the invite should contain approximate member counts

query.name: with_expiration
query.description: whether the invite should contain the expiration date

query.name: guild_scheduled_event_id
query.description: the guild scheduled event to include with the invite

name: Delete Invite
description: Delete an invite. Requires the `MANAGE_CHANNELS` permission on the channel this invite belongs to, or `MANAGE_GUILD` to remove any invite across the guild. Returns an [invite](#DOCS_RESOURCES_INVITE/invite-object) object on success. Fires a [Invite Delete](#DOCS_TOPICS_GATEWAY/invite-delete) Gateway event.
